Ok, so please don't crucify me, commenters, but this is actually the first time i have to disagree with Jonathan on one small thing. The AA-12 was specifically engineered as an automatic combat shotgun to the point where it almost completely nullifies the recoil of even the heaviest shotgun rounds (which was demonstrated by, among others, FPSRussia, don't know if that video can still be found), so if there is any automatic shotgun that would actually be useful in a situation like this, it would be that thing.
the fact you have to cycle the gun again after reloading a non empty mag is aggravating

So glad that John noticed how pistols are reloaded in the game, believe me John you're not the only one that noticed and every single pistol does that animation.
Edit: Just as a comment on the reload animation for the "M4" one of the Cleaners (yes that's what their called John) was a soldier so he likely had enough training to be able to perform that kind of reload fluently and likely passed this training down to the other Cleaners.
